description.text:
I want to $(b;spring)pet$() every creature that is in this book!
 Like for real! Starting with the $(b;spring)Deer$()! 

It say's here 'These deer are a docile mix of does and stags' ...but...the book says nothing about them
 Ow! How can you tell? The antlers? Ah! I see...mortal creatures are weird...
-The little pixie looks at you with a puzzling investigating look- 
Do you have antlers?...
Aaw its adorable! We should keep tons of them at our home! -The pixie tries to close both ears of the deer- And I think they would taste really good!
